title: Zara Women's Floral Midi Dress - Blue Floral Print - Size M
description: The Zara Women's Floral Midi Dress in Blue Floral Print is perfect for any spring or summer occasion. This elegant dress features an A-line silhouette with a fitted bodice and a flowy midi-length skirt that falls gracefully to mid-calf. Made from a lightweight and breathable fabric, this dress showcases a vibrant floral print that adds a touch of charm to your wardrobe. The short sleeves and V-neckline enhance the feminine design, while the side zipper ensures a comfortable fit. Ideal for both casual outings and formal events, this dress is a versatile choice for any woman's wardrobe.
key_features: A-line silhouette with a flowy midi-length skirt
Vibrant blue floral print for a fresh, spring look
meta_title: Zara Women's Floral Midi Dress - Blue Floral Print - Size M
meta_description: Shop the Zara Women's Floral Midi Dress in Blue Floral Print. Elegant A-line design with a flowy skirt, lightweight fabric, and a V-neckline. Perfect for casual and formal occasions. Size M available.
